entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Port Colborne
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle this evening and then to 30 percent chance of snow near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
